comment.author: 33051402@N05
comment._content: This is a great picture.  It captures the time period quite effectively.  She truly is an inspiration to us all.  It's amazing to know that she was the first person who was both deaf and blind to graduate from college.  I recently read on Wikipedia that she was an activist as well.  I didn't know that she campaigned for women's right to vote.

comment.author: 33087193@N07
comment._content: She really is an inspirational person. She was an activist for woman's right to vote. She was the first deaf blind person to graduate from college.
